title: [LFM] Jungle main Diamond 4+ plus for challenger ranked 5s
body:
We are actively looking for a reliable Jungle player with flexible availability. We currently have 4 permanent members but require a Jungle player that matches or exceeds our level.

We are interested in competing in open ladder with the interest of qualifying for OCS in the next season and climbing further in challenger.
We are Melbourne based so this is a major criteria for application as we compete and wish to continue to compete in the many lans available to us around the city.
Age isn't important but maturity obviously is, we want someone that is happy to pitch in on our discussions and improving on our macro and micro play.

Ranked experience is preferred but not absolutely necessary, though experience in shot calling would give you an advantage over other players.

Contact ingame IGN RnG Malliot or RnG Murakiri and we can start a dialog :P

TLDR - Challenger Team looking for Jungle main from melbourne diamond 4+ candidates apply

replies.body:
Hi there RNG! I work for Quintessential eSports and we're looking for anyone who is diamond or above and in oce to apply for our pro team! If you think this is something for all four of you (or maybe a few of you) and applications are still open at [www.qtesports.com](http://www.qtesports.com) ! We very much hope all of you apply, we are already in talks with sponsors and have streamers on our books. Additionally we have an analyst hired to provide support and are in talks with potential coaches. Please shoot us an email and perhaps we can fuse (if we have 4 places available when you respond). Look forward to hearing from you <3
- Thanks QTE team
